testcase.name: Validate the Dashboard for valid user
testcase.system-out: Given User invoke the chrome browser........................................passed And Navigate to the collegeBag Login Page...................................passed When User enter "email" and "password" into the fields......................passed And Click on Signin Button..................................................passed Then Dashboard is displayed for valid users.................................passed And students and courses tables are also displayed in Dashboard option......passed And User click on signout and close the browser.............................passed

testcase.classname: Courses tab validation in CollegeBag Application
testcase.name: Validate Courses tab for Valid User
testcase.system-out: Given User invoke the chrome browser........................................passed And Navigate to the collegeBag Login Page...................................passed When User enter "email" and "password" into the fields......................passed And Click on Signin Button..................................................passed Then Dashboard is displayed for valid users.................................passed When User click on Courses tab on to the page...............................passed Then filter box and add button is displayed on the page.....................passed And Course name also displayed along with acronym and actions options.......passed And User click on signout and close the browser.............................passed

testcase.classname: Courses tab validation in CollegeBag Application
testcase.name: Validate Add button into courses tab for Valid User
testcase.system-out: Given User invoke the chrome browser........................................passed And Navigate to the collegeBag Login Page...................................passed When User enter "email" and "password" into the fields......................passed And Click on Signin Button..................................................passed Then Dashboard is displayed for valid users.................................passed When User click on Courses tab on to the page...............................passed Then filter box and add button is displayed on the page.....................passed When User click on Add button on the page...................................passed Then New Courses Page is displayed..........................................passed When User enter coursename and acronym into the box.........................passed And click on save button....................................................passed Then new course should be added into the course list........................passed

testcase.name: Validate Login Page for Invalid User
testcase.system-out: Given User invoke the chrome browser........................................passed And Navigate to the collegeBag Login Page...................................passed When User enter email "admin@gmail.com" and password "admin@123" into the fields.passed And Click on Signin Button..................................................passed Then error message is displayed.............................................passed And User close the browser..................................................passed
